transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji.
Executive: Sir very good afternoon, main Ashi from IndiaMART.
Customer: Bataye.
Executive: Sir abhi aapne hamare customer care pe customer care pe call kiya tha sir.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aap main aapse puchna chah rahi thi koi problem aa rahi thi aapne customer care pe call kiya tha?
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Jab se maine TrustSeal ka certificate liya hai, sorry TrustSeal ka subscription liya hai, maine paisa de diya, uske baad se not a single call mere ko receive hua IndiaMART ki taraf se, ek bhi single call nahi, ek mam ne call kiya tha, main aapki new manager hu, theek hai, uske baad koi call nahi aaya, ye jo abhi naya sir hai, inko main hi do teen baar call kiya hu magar ye sahi se response nahi dete hai mere ko.
Executive: Sir 18 September ko aapki services live hui thi, 18 September 2025 mein, theek hai.
Executive: Aapko 18 September ko humne call kiya tha, main aapko bata deti hu ki as per customer time we can call you.
Executive: Theek hai, hum log apne customer ko har 30 days mein connect karte hai, theek hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To agar aapko jaise aapko beech mein koi dikkat aati hai isiliye hum log aapko dedicated account manager dete hai, theek hai.
Customer: Wo to theek hai, kam ka nahi hai nikamma hai wo manager aapka.
Executive: Sir main unki manager baat haan to main unki manager baat kar rahi hu sir isiliye maine connect kiya hai aapko aapko jab aapne 18 September ko service host karaya tha to hum logo ne usi month mein aapko ek baar demo diya tha ki ye TrustSeal ki service aapki live ho gayi hai ye TrustSeal mein hum itni buyleads dete hai yahan se aap check kar sakte hai ye operate kar sakte hai theek hai ye cheez humne aapko bataya tha.
Executive: Dusra hum log aapko har 30 days pe call karte hai, abhi aap mujhe ye bataye ki aapka TrustSeal ki services lene ke baad aapko calls to main dekh rahi hu aayi hai IndiaMART ke buyers ki aayi hai aapko hum logo ne bhi approach kiya hai but call respond nahi hua hai sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Haan call respond nahi hua hai, theek hai.
Customer: Aisa nahi hai.
Executive: Sorry.
Customer: Humko humko A to Z call ka hum log response dete hai, theek hai na koi bhi call aisa nahi hai ki humko miss hota hai.
Executive: Sir might be aap us samay busy honge, abhi aap mujhe bataye aapko kya dikkat aa rahi hai, abhi aap se Vivek Aarya ne Vivek Aarya ne to aaj tak deliver nahi hua hai.
Customer: TrustSeal sir aapko 45 days mein deliver hota hai, theek hai 18 tarikh ko live hua hai sir 30 days hi 30 abhi aapko 45 days nahi hua hai sir agar till date agar aap dekhenge na to 45 days ke baad hum aapko dispatch off karte hai sir, theek hai 18 tarikh ko service live hui hai uske baad humne welcome call aapko 23 24 ke around kiya hai, theek hai to sir us mahine ka aapka jo din hai theek hai uske baad jo remaining days hai us pe aapka October ka pura hum logo ka ek month gaya hai to sir aapko TrustSeal ke certificate jab hum services live karte hai uske hum 40 45 days complete hone ke baad hi aapko dispose off karte hai, theek hai to ab aapko TrustSeal ke certificate aapko dispatch kar diya jayega aapke address pe agar aap mujhe bata sakte hai to aap mere ko ek bar address bata dijiye ki aapka jo address mere pass updated hai kya usi address pe dispatch karana hai?
Customer: Aapka address mere pass updated hai.
Customer: Abhi call kar rahe hai tab aapko dhyan mein aa raha hai ki haan inka certificate to reh hi gaya tha ab bahana kar rahi hai kya?
Executive: Sir main bahana nahi kar rahi hu sir main process ke hisab se aapko bata rahi hu sir main bahana kyu karungi aapko.
Customer: Aap apne hisab se kam kijiye theek hai na aapke pass jo process aap apne process ke hisab se kam kijiye theek hai aapke pass jo address mention kiya gaya hai usi address pe mujhe deliver kijiye.
Executive: Theek.
Executive: Haan sir to main aapko confirm kar rahi hu sir na aapko to main ek bar confirm karungi na sir ki sir yahi address hai na.
Customer: Nahi mat kijiye.
Executive: Sir dekhiye aap mere customer hai.
Customer: Aapke pass jo address hai usi pe aap matlab jab deliver kijiye theek hai aapke pass jo baat deliver hone ke baad karenge theek hai.
Executive: Sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received TrustSeal certificate.

- Customer not receiving calls from IndiaMART.

- Account manager is not responsive.



Resolution:

- Explained TrustSeal delivery takes 45 days.

- Confirmed dispatch after 45 days completion.

- Offered to verify the customer's address.



Next Steps: 

- Customer refused address verification.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- trustseal, delivery, subscription, follow up
